methods.name: createTimestampWithNanos
methods.description: Convert a timestamp (represented as a string or an array) to a Timestamp class with nanosecond support.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: The timestamp as a string or an array.

params.name: returnType
params.description: The type to create and return. Any object used must provide a constructor compatible with Google\Cloud\Core\Timestamp. Defaults to Google\Cloud\Core\Timestamp.
